title: The Unfriendly Dragon
description: Disney artist, Seth Weinberg, and epic fantasy author, Brae Wyckoff, bring something special together in this children's book!An unfriendly dragon? Not everything is as it appears. In this amazing adventure, Bridazak and his friends set off on a journey for justice. On their way, they uncover truth and discover the value of friendship. “A great read-aloud, especially in a group setting. I would highly recommend this book to anyone teaching the importance of how to make new friends and celebrating differences.” ---Brittany Walker, Licensed Utah Elementary EducatorFor ages 4 and upNote to parents: There is no fighting or weapons in this book
author: Brae Wyckoff
